title: Live Updates: Thousands Flee Southern Lebanon as Israel Launches More Strikes on Hezbollah
content: Lebanon health officials said Israeli attacks since Monday have killed hundreds, including women and children. Israel claimed it had killed one senior Hezbollah commander with an airstrike on a building in the southern suburbs of Beirut.
summary: Lebanon health officials said Israeli attacks since Monday have killed hundreds, including women and children. Israel claimed it had killed one senior Hezbollah commander with an airstrike on a building in the southern suburbs of Beirut.

title: U.N. General Assembly: U.N. Live Updates: Biden Warns That World Faces an ‘Inflection Point’ Amid Global Turmoil
content: In his final U.N. speech, President Biden addressed the wars in Ukraine, the Middle East and Sudan, drawing on the long arc of his career to stress that progress is possible.

title: In Beirut, Israel’s Strikes Stoke Fears of War

title: Ukrainian Poet and Rock Star Fights Near Front and Performs Behind It
content: Serhiy Zhadan, 50, is a beloved Ukrainian poet as well as a novelist, lyricist and rock star. Furious over the invasion, he enlisted to fight even as his band still plays and his readings fill halls.

title: As Lebanon Reels From Israeli Attacks, the Future Is Murky for a Wounded Hezbollah
